columns.SSN: A unique identifier for each scientist, represented by their Social Security Number.
columns.Name: The full name of the scientist, consisting of both first and last names.

Scientists.table_description: The Scientists table stores information about individual scientists, identified by their SSNs and accompanied by their names.

columns.Code: A unique identifier for each project, used to distinguish between different projects within the database.
columns.Name: The title or description of the project, providing insight into its focus or purpose.
columns.Hours: The total amount of time, measured in hours, allocated to the project, indicating its scale or resource investment.

Projects.table_description: The Projects table maintains a collection of research projects, each defined by a unique code, a descriptive name, and the total hours dedicated to its execution.

columns.Scientist: This column identifies a unique scientist assigned to a specific project.
columns.Project: This column identifies the unique code of a project to which the scientist is assigned.

AssignedTo.table_description: The AssignedTo table captures the relationships between scientists and projects, indicating which scientist is assigned to which project.
